title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, June 26, 2020
description: On this day 20 years ago, scientific teams completed the first rough map of the human genome. One finding: the human species goes back 7,000 generations.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day 20 years ago, scientific teams completed the first rough map of the human genome. One finding: the human species goes back 7,000 generations.
